entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Humidity: 80 %

Dewpoint: -3.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
